title: PIXASSO Free Download
description:
Get PIXASSO PC for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP all indie games with latest updates
PIXASSO is a relaxing game for lovers of the coloring of tiny pixel art. Just chill and have fun Train your coloring skills in more than 50 beautiful hand painted levels. There are 4 different sizes of levels, they will never let you get bored. You can easily relax with good soundtrack and nice sounds of coloring. Try to color pictures in another way, be creative! And share your interesting results in community hub. PICO PARK
